message: Let's split it fairly, 60/40, I think it's a good starting point.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more, considering the initial offer was 60/40 in my favor.

I'm willing to meet you halfway. This offer is a bit more balanced, considering the inflation, but I still think I deserve a slight edge.
